attributes.action: Offer himself for re-election by mandate from the United Kingdom voting public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We currently have a Prime Minister who has acceded to the position without true contest of election on a Party or National basis.

We the undersigned request that the Prime Minister  rectify this untenable position by calling a General Election and offering himself to the mandate of the voting public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
